protocols.Paper_title: A Saliva-Based RNA Extraction-Free Workflow Integrated With Cas13a for SARS-CoV-2 Detection
Methods: other:mucolytic/mucoactive treatment (N-acetyl cysteine; sodium citrate/ammonium chloride)

protocols.Paper_title: A Saliva-Based RNA Extraction-Free Workflow Integrated With Cas13a for SARS-CoV-2 Detection

protocols.Paper_title: A Saliva-Based RNA Extraction-Free Workflow Integrated With Cas13a for SARS-CoV-2 Detection
Methods: other:chemical treatment with N-acetyl cysteine (mucolytic/reducing agent) in RNA release buffer; direct use of treated saliva for RT-qPCR/SHERLOCK

protocols.Paper_title: A Saliva-Based RNA Extraction-Free Workflow Integrated With Cas13a for SARS-CoV-2 Detection
Methods: other:RNA extraction-based (kit-based) workflow on saliva collected in RNAlater; used for RT-qPCR comparison (details not provided on these pages)

protocols.Paper_title: A Saliva-Based RNA Extraction-Free Workflow Integrated With Cas13a for SARS-CoV-2 Detection
